Quotations.ab: ka †gumbad-ē wēnēd u-š nəmasə.tē ātarš mazdā̊ ahurahe huδā̊ mazišta ẏazata ōh gōwišn andar im xānag
When he sees a dome (of a fire temple), he has to recite nəmasə.tē ātarš mazdā̊ ahurahe huδā̊ mazišta ẏazata in this building."

ab.ab: "In this way, after having made both hands pure, the chief priest facing the East (standing) in front of the fire urn, recites the Avestan (text) below: nəmasə.te ātarš mazdā̊ ahurahe huδā̊ mazišta yazata xšnaoϑra ahurahe mazdā̊."
